title: Clorox Wins 2023 EPA Award for Advancing Green Chemistry - PR Newswire
summary: Clorox Company received the EPA's 2023 Green Chemistry Challenge Award for its Clorox EcoClean™ Disinfecting Cleaner, which uses a plant-based active ingredient to kill germs and reduces virgin plastic in its packaging. This award recognizes Clorox's commitment to environmental sustainability and responsible business practices, highlighting its efforts to develop eco-friendly products and reduce hazardous substances.

title: Innovations from Cosmetic 360's 2023 edition - BW Confidential
summary: The ninth edition of Cosmetic 360, a trade show dedicated to innovation in the beauty industry, focused on CleanTech. The event showcased eco-conscious brands with a focus on compostable packaging, locally sourced ingredients, and decarbonization, as well as innovative technologies like AI skin diagnosis and supply chain traceability solutions.  Several companies presented green innovations, including hemp-based cosmetics and a new skin imaging technique to evaluate anti-aging products.
product_or_process: Unisex beauty products, soap and solid shampoo made with hemp

title: Coffee biorefinery opened in Denmark to upcycle coffee grounds - FoodNavigator.com
summary: Kaffe Bueno, a company based in Denmark, has developed a biorefinery that upcycles spent coffee grounds into food and cosmetic products. This process prevents the release of harmful greenhouse gases, such as methane, that would otherwise be emitted from the decomposing coffee grounds. The biorefinery aims to expand its production capacity to 1,500 tons per year and is exploring partnerships in other countries to establish additional biorefineries.
product_or_process: Biorefinery process for upcycling coffee grounds

title: Top pharma companies 2023: A satisfactory year - PharmaLive
summary: The pharmaceutical industry is undergoing a period of significant change, with companies focusing on new innovations beyond COVID-19, expanding their pipelines through acquisitions and collaborations, and navigating the challenges posed by the Inflation Reduction Act. Many companies are also actively pursuing initiatives to reduce their carbon footprint and advance their environmental strategies, demonstrating a growing awareness of the impact of climate change on human health.
